doc.field: Includes HRL with a group of boys on a camping trip; HRL's sisters Elisabeth and Emmavail; HRL? with a large group of individuals in small boats; wedding of HRL's parents Henry Winters Luce and Elizabeth Middleton Luce?; HRL with his father, sisters, and younger brother Sheldon; HRL with hands in pockets next to his mother and Sheldon?; HRL's mother in front of a fir tree; HRL with his mother and Sheldon? in a small boat; HRL with the entire family; HRL with a group of individuals on deck of a Hamburg-Amerika ship on his way to Europe; HRL's passport photo; HRL with a group of Chefoo School classmates including Theodore Wilder; HRL at Camp Diamond in Colebrook, New Hampshire; HRL in a posed family portrait with his mother and siblings; and HRL with his siblings on front steps of a house.
Series IX. Photographs >> 1915 and Before Miscellaneous (2 folders)
